============================================
  REVIT MCP - AI-Powered Tools for Revit
============================================

Thank you for downloading Revit MCP!


QUICK INSTALL
=============
1. Right-click "Install.bat" and select "Run as administrator"
2. The installer will auto-detect your Revit version(s)
3. Select which Revit versions to install for
4. Done!


FIRST USE
=========
1. Open Autodesk Revit
2. You'll see a new "Revit MCP" tab in the ribbon
3. Click "Settings" to enter your Google AI API Key
   - Get a free key at: https://aistudio.google.com/apikey
4. Click "Start MCP Service" to activate
5. Use the Tools Hub to access 20+ AI-powered tools!


CONNECT TO AI CLIENT (Optional)
================================
To use with Claude Desktop, Cursor, or other MCP clients:
1. Open the file: C:\Program Files\RevitMCP\mcp-config-example.json
2. Replace "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE" with your actual API key
3. Copy the config into your AI client's MCP settings


UNINSTALL
=========
Right-click "Uninstall.bat" and select "Run as administrator"


SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
===================
- Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
- Autodesk Revit 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023, 2024, 2025, or 2026
- Internet connection (for AI features)
